Articles.Content: Has anyone considered making a mod that imports all of ksp 2s soundtrack and maybe even the rocket and staging noises into ksp 2? I think sound is the final frontier of ksp 1 modding yet to be perfected and I and I know many others who would kill to hear anything other than the current space music. Someone should do it, maybe I will. Are there limitations to this? Copyright or what not? Some thinking should be done on this.

i think you can do that with this mod, but you need the music files:

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/topic/191467-112x-soundtrack-editor-forked/

i don’t even really consider this as a mod, it’s almost like a plug-in because of the way it’s installed. Not on CKAN due to the way it’s installed.

11 hours ago, JNSQFan said:

i think you can do that with this mod, but you need the music files:

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/topic/191467-112x-soundtrack-editor-forked/

i don’t even really consider this as a mod, it’s almost like a plug-in because of the way it’s installed. Not on CKAN due to the way it’s installed.

I discovered this just after making the post, would anyone be interested if i made a config with the original idea in mind? I don’t think its possible to replace the engine audio, but maybe! 

Edited August 12, 2023 by turnerjack698

Would love to see it.
